## 3. DESCRIPTION (Final Public Copy ‚Äî Plain Text)
The city is still quiet.
The sky begins to soften from deep blue into pastel light.
A CRT monitor glows gently on a retro desk as the day slowly wakes up.
This 3-hour LoFi and Synthwave mix is designed for early-morning focus, calm productivity, and uninterrupted work sessions. Warm analog textures, soft rhythms, and gradual sunrise energy help you ease into coding, studying, writing, or creative work without distractions.
The mood evolves gently from pre-dawn calm into focused morning clarity.
All music is royalty free and safe for content creators.
Best for:
- Morning coding and development
- Studying and reading
- Creative work and writing
- Calm, focused productivity
Aesthetic:
Soft sunrise glow ‚Ä¢ CRT screen text ‚Ä¢ pastel city skyline ‚Ä¢ analog desk gear ‚Ä¢ warm lamp light ‚Ä¢ quiet morning atmosphere
